ISSUE.TITLE: Context is not optional
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: ## Summary The description if the `build` command states that `CONTEXT` is optional: https://github.com/containers/podman/blob/2e0ee6ed50aeae7c0219205cbbc6150ccc70448b/cmd/podman/images/build.go#L51 However one can easily prove that this is not true: ## Steps to reproduce ```bash mkdir example cd example touch Containerfile podman build ``` ### Expected result Podman should discover the Containerfile in the current directory and use current directory as context. ### Actual result Podman throws error `Error: no context directory and no Containerfile specified` ## Further notes - Also the [manual states](https://docs.podman.io/en/latest/markdown/podman-build.1.html) that context is optional - I am not sure what the intended behavior is. - Should podman discover the context/containerfile automatically? - or are the docs wrong and context is only optional if a containerfile is specified with `-f`?
